author: aruny
msg: bjectFactory class exposes class loaders publicly which allow untrusted code to access internal classes. Making following changes to fix it.
1.Duplicating the ObjectFactory, SecuritySupport.java and SecuritySupport12.java class in order to make it package private in each of the   packages that require its services.
2.Using checkPackageAccess() to prevent access to internal packages of jdk(sun.*).

author: aruny
msg: ObjectFactory class exposes class loaders publicly which allow untrusted code to access internal classes. Making following changes to fix it.
1.Duplicating the ObjectFactory, SecuritySupport.java and SecuritySupport12.java class in order to make it package private in each of the   packages that require its services.
2.Using checkPackageAccess() to prevent access to internal packages of jdk(sun.*).

author: zongaro
msg: Changed condition under which the parent element's m_inArgsSize field is
incremented - that field keeps track of the number of xsl:param children an
element has.  This was only happening for ElemTemplate, but it needs to happen
for ElemExsltFunction, which is a subclass of ElemTemplate, as well.
